title: Love this app
text: I have picked up at several restaurants in the DC area the food has been very good . It‚Äôs a fun adventure to try places you might of otherwise never considered. My only complaint it that I live 2+ hours from the closest restaurant. Hopefully more places join in the fun ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Very sustainable / eco friendly. Favorite way to eat!!! <3
text: So many good choices, and it‚Äôs always nice to be surprised and try new things. I love how much food waste is being saved with this and I greatly appreciate the companies that participate. Thank you too good to go and those involved <3

title: Fantastic idea and a delicious way to lessen food waste!
text: I love everything about this app! It‚Äôs such a great idea to work to combat food waste, it‚Äôs so common in the restaurant industry. I hope more and more restaurants start using Too Good to Go, it‚Äôs a great value to consumers like me and a fun way to try out new places.

title: Horrible Service
text:
I tried ordering food from this app, but when I got to the restaurant, they said they aren‚Äôt serving any food and there is no way the app lets them choose that. I‚Äôve been trying to follow up with the customer support team to get a refund but haven‚Äôt heard back anything yet! 
Their website doesn‚Äôt even list a way of contacting them.
I had high hopes! Disappointed! Never going to use the app again, neither would I recommend it to anyone!

title: Bad app design, wasted my time and money!
text: I was using the app for the first time so i didn‚Äôt realize that i selected an order which needed to be picked within 5mins after i ordered it, because the store was closing in 5mins. In my opinion the app should not have presented me this option because it needed pick up within 5mins after i ordered it. This is quite a stupid design which lead me to waste my time and money. Also, now i am dealing with their customer support to get my money back :(

title: Saving money and discovering new stuff
text: I love a grab bag. I‚Äôve had good experiences with 4 different pickups. The employees all seem really cool about it. Everything I‚Äôve picked up was actually before it‚Äôs expiration date. They‚Äôre doing a good job of predicting what won‚Äôt sell and passing it on.

title: New TGTGers
text: We are new to this site and have enjoyed the experience. The offerings have allowed us a great introduction to new foods and restaurants.  This in turn helps us to identify places that we plan on frequenting in the future.  We will happily continue this exploration and feed our curiosity (pun intended) and taste buds!

title: Just. Do. It.
text: This app is so worth it. Not only you save up on food, but you help reduce food waste. It‚Äôs so awesome not knowing what you‚Äôd get. It‚Äôs always a surprise. And frankly, sometimes not a good one. But overall, if you chose where to get your food from, it is absolutely worth it.

title: Wonderful!
text: This is such a great concept, a win-win-win for everyone involved. My question is, why isn‚Äôt every restaurant, cafe, store is participating? No waste, great deal, built-in positive marketing for establishments. Love it, check every day and spread the word to all my friends and family.

title: Genius Idea
text: I hope more restaurants will consider adopting this app into their business model because it is honestly a great idea. Just picked up my first surprise bag tonight and got some really yummy things for a great price!!! üëè Will definitely be doing this again in the near future.

title: Amazing app of the year!
text: Who ever thought of this app to create is a genius. I was able to get so many stuff that cost only 5 dollars. I got a bunch of cheddar chesse, 2 whip creams, and a b un ch of chicken nuggets. They even let me keep their bag that they prepared for me!!! Love this, going to be using this everyday. Saving a lot of üí∞üí∞üí∞üí∞

title: Great! Wish distance was more granular
text: Works better than expected! I live in a walkable city and choosing a 1 mile or 2 mile radius is not the best. Sometimes I want to see places within 0.5 miles, and other times I‚Äôm interested in places 1.2 miles away.

title: A Win-Win For Your Wallet & the Environment
text: Get this app if you want to try out a ton if different foods and some quality restaurants and shops for a small fraction of the actual cost. Plus, you‚Äôre saving food from being wasted! It‚Äôs a win-win for your wallet and the environment!

title: Love this app
text: I can see this becoming a hobby, going and trying out new locations for things I‚Äôve never tried. I love how accessible it is for low income people like myself, and I love how it helps the business owners recoup some loss they have with food going to waste.

title: This app is FRAUDULENT
text: My experience with using this app is I paid $5 for a ‚Äúsurprise bag‚Äù from a local ice cream shop. When I showed up the worker said he never had nothing to give me and that this was often the case with people who purchase on TooGoodToGo. There is no communication between the shop and TooGoodToGo. They accept your payments and the transaction ends there.  There is no accountability by TGTG customer service. Just submit a request for refund and they‚Äôll assume next time it‚Äôll work out.

title: Absolutely incredible app
text: My favorite app! I‚Äôm a college student and with rising food costs this app has been a life saver. I wish more restaurants utilized this absolutely incredible app, I recommend it to everyone! Thank you so much to the developers you guys are amazing.

title: This is amazing
text: I love everything about this.  Food not going to waste, businesses making something on it, keeping food out of landfills which is a huge creator methane gas, and people getting treats or food they may not normally be able to afford.  SERIOUSLY ALL THE THINGS!

title: Stopping food waste creatively
text: I never want to write app reviews, but I am writing this one because this service is really helping with the stop of food waste. I got my first surprise bag and it was awesome. A giant meal with two sides. I will buy again. This is a great app and everyone should get it.

title: Rice rice baby!
text: Don‚Äôt let the ‚Äúsurprise box‚Äù fool you. No surprises at all. What you gonna get for $5 is 2 pieces of chicken and plenty of rice. It‚Äôs been 3 days and 3 restaurants. They all gave me the same stuff. Still a good deal but I feel like I‚Äôm done though. The idea is naive on the paper but nothing works like they do in commercials right?

title: Bread, bread, and more bread!!!
text: First time trying this app and I got a hard loaf of bread and 2 stale muffins in my surprise bag from a restaurant that sells soups, salads, sandwiches, and many other savory dishes. I could have just bought a loaf of bread from the grocery store or local bakery for cheaper. You have to pay before, so be aware what you get might be a hit or miss. This is a great app if you want muffins, croissants, fries or baguettes. I think it would be better to donate to the homeless.

title: What‚Äôs with all the junk mail?
text: I appreciate an app like this to save and not waste in a world that we live in. We need more people coming up with great ideas like this. Yet, I do have a problem with them selling my email address to other businesses. I have so much junk mail now, thanks to TooGoodToGo.

title: Really excellent app!
text:
I‚Äôve done this a few times, and every time has been great. Really good food, couldn‚Äôt be any cheaper, and, of course, you feel like a saint.
I‚Äôve been recommending this to friends, hope more restaurants catch on. Thanks, guys!

title: loading issue
text: For the last couple days I been through some serious issues with just opening the app! My internet and other things works just well but it takes like a million years to loading the content! I can‚Äôt even access the home page for most of the time!

title: Not a single place in Palm Springs Ca!
text: It‚Äôs a good theory but it will never work. Why not donate to food banks? I‚Äôm not only mostly vegetarian but diabetic so I can‚Äôt eat bread or carbs. I should be able to choose what I buy. Palm Springs is the most progressive city in Calif now so you‚Äôd think it would be here. Maybe it‚Äôs just too new but I doubt it‚Äôs going to be cheap enough to make it worth the gas and effort. The idea of a ‚Äúmagic bag ‚Äú that has to GO!! Old food surprise bag is not tempting!

title: Great App! Great Food Options!
text: Easy to use app that helps me connect to local eateries and do my part to fight against food waste. I‚Äôve done at least 5 pickups and all the food has been fresh and delicious. Will definitely continue to use this app.

title: Too Good, Better, Best
text: This program is awesome. The restaurants involved are great and I‚Äôm having a blast living in downtown Chicago and enjoying all the goodies being offered. Thanks a lot guys for helping to save food from going to waste. Moreover, I‚Äôve been spreading the word without any hesitation. Kudos.

title: Trash quality and not the actual food value they‚Äôre advertising.
text:
I saw this app from tv and read the reviews here and wanted to give it a try. 
For $5.99 i supposed to get food value of $15 )
i ‚Äòve got bowl of cold fried rice with burnt eggs that should have been thrown away . (You know how a bad batch when cooking)

At a coffee shop i‚Äôve got items that was worth $7 , and the package looked like it‚Äôs been grabbed by 20 people and very long waiting line. 
 
2 places and that‚Äôs it for me . I think the restaurant should take the loss as they‚Äôre ready making 70-80% profit and they want to be greedy and still making money of these ‚Äútrash quality foods ‚Äù ?  Wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if someone got food poisoning and making lawsuits. 
FYI : i saved $1-2  from buying it fresh .  
Not worth it .

title: Scam.
text: They allow restaurants to change pick up times up until 2 hrs before the reserved pick up time. However, restaurant changes it to when they are closed and the app doesn‚Äôt notify you successfully in time. So restaurant is making money for food they are either still tossing or don‚Äôt have. Customer service states they will get back to you in 5 days! That‚Äôs unacceptable! I really loved the concept stopping food waste but it‚Äôs a terrible roll out.

title: Great vision & great product
text: I love the goal for this app - ending food waste! I‚Äôve used it a few times and haven‚Äôt been disappointed. Sure, you can‚Äôt be sure of what you‚Äôll get but it‚Äôs great that the food dower good o to waste and for $5, how disappointed can you be at a bag of baked goods? ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: What a find!
text: This is such a great value and a lot of fun for me. The surprises vary from decent value to amazing! Hoping this will grow though. There‚Äôs not a very broad selection. I have to hunt and there‚Äôs not always something available that‚Äôs close to me. But it‚Äôs worth it and for a good cause

title: Good deal
text: Had a great experience so far but I wish that they add an option where I can read users review from the restaurant. I think it would help a lot so I can kinda get an idea of what I‚Äôll get in the bag and if it‚Äôs worth the money or not.

title: Great app but doesn‚Äôt show detail reviews
text: I enjoy the service and discovering area restaurants. They need to provide access to detailed reviews from other users, just providing readings from store is not enough. There is rating inflation. Now I only go to the highest rated ones, since I have little clue.

title: Happy Customer
text: The hospitality, was great as well as the friendliness, and food. They didn‚Äôt give you a small tin size serving because of the low price. They gave you what you would have gotten if you were paying full price.

title: Cool resource
text: I love what this app is for. Aside from saving food and lowering waste, it‚Äôs also great for finding new spots that interest you. Every new pickup is an adventure for me. I wish more places participated near me, but I‚Äôm so glad I found this app and I tell everyone about it!

title: Green app and saves green for your wallet.
text: This app needs to expand! As a long time food industry worker I can speak first hand to how much food waste happens daily. This app enables being able to shop smart and cheap! This is good for both the vendor and the customer.

title: LOVE THIS!
text: I am amazed at the quality of what we have gotten so far from this app. Because you think it‚Äôs going to be seconds and leftovers and such, and while that does show up in it, it is also very high quality food.

title: Great app
text: Concern about food waste has been bothering me for years, thank you guys for coming up with such a smart idea to fight it! Hope more stores and people will join this fight. Definitely gonna recommend to everyone I know!

title: Only Works for Dessert
text: This review is from Los Angeles - there are very few restaurants that actually work with this app here, at least in my area. Of the ones that do, it‚Äôs almost entirely coffee shops, and while they serve plenty of things like sandwiches and prepackaged food, I have never received anything but bags of leftover cookies, maybe some croissants. Which is fine if you want that I guess.

title: These people are giving you garbage
text: They should change their name to ‚Äúshould‚Äôve been gone‚Äù. My first order after driving all the way over there, the woman gave away my food. My second order at a grocery store was nothing but rotted produce, and a loaf of bread that was so hard I could‚Äôve busted a car window with it! There was mold on the vegetables! And the greens would‚Äôve totally had you in the bathroom for hours if you ate it. Wasted time and gas just to get a bag of trash.

title: Amazing. Such a good idea. This is so fun!
text: I never leave reviews but this experience was such a treat I felt like I had to. For such a low cost compared to delivery/pickup apps like doordash or uber eats, this offers that same feeling of a take out bite for a fraction of the cost. This is such a genius idea and I‚Äôm so surprised no one thought of it sooner.

title: Best discovery yet
text: I love a bargain and I love saving perfectly delicious food from the compost pile. My family is always happy when I bring home the surprise bag, no matter what‚Äôs inside. If it‚Äôs not a favorite we happily share with friends and neighbors. Keep up the good work!

title: Login Doesn‚Äôt Work
text: I‚Äôm trying to login in with my Apple ID, email, even with my Facebook account that never use, I received a pop up window saying that is something wrong with the process, any suggestions?

title: Ratings
text: I‚Äôd like to see the ratings system updated. I want to be able to revise my star rating either because I accidentally hit 3 instead of 4, or changed my mind after trying the food. Currently, a tap of the finger locks you in with no chance to correct.

title: wish we could read reviews in the app
text: I love this app and how it fights against food waste. My only con with this app is that we cannot see the details of reviews left for restaurants/eateries - only the star rating and how many reviews they have. It would be great if reviews were made public!

title: Cheap and tasty, AND not waste-y?!
text: I love this app! It‚Äôs so convenient to just reserve some food and swing by, and honestly the food has been great. Add on to this that it fights huge amounts of food waste, and it‚Äôs a perfect experience. I‚Äôd say ‚Äúgreat for people on a budget,‚Äù but honestly it‚Äôs great for anyone. Big recommend.

title: NEW OBSESSION
text: Love this concept, this app, and every tasty food I save from the trash. Crushing it, my only recc would be to show the location differently when you search for too good to go in other areas it shows the county which is not intuitive in the US.

title: Wholesome & Great Value!
text: I always love finding ways and apps to be frugal, and I think it‚Äôs very important to reduce waste and help the environment in any way‚Äî so having an app like this that lets you do both is AMAZING!! Love it and wish there were more apps like this out there!

title: Sounds better than it is!
text:
Ok let me say this, totally a great idea and we do have waste problem we need to address 
But there must be better way than how this app leads you to believe 
Stores do not give you the good food it was about to go waste if you didn‚Äôt buy it 
They basically dump anything was not sold for a couple of days or was poorly made and nobody bought, etc. 
this is NOT the food you could otherwise buy in the right mind.

title: Great way to save money, prevent waste, and have fun!
text: This app is such a great idea. It‚Äôs criminal how much food is thrown out. Now, that food can go to use. The process to use it is seamless, and this helps people struggling with food insecurity, looking for a good deal, and seeking a little food adventure!

title: Excellent app with a massive flaw
text: There needs to be a way to tip in the app. I never carry cash anymore due to covid and it slipped my mind to bring any when I picked up my first order. Obviously that‚Äôs at least partially on me but I‚Äôm sure there are plenty of other people out there who would gladly tip the staff at these establishments if the option was presented in-app.
